page.title: 10A School Boys Day
page.content: When I got home from school,my mum and I took the rabbit and settled it down. Then mum said we are going shopping. Before we went I wanted something to eat so mum said I could have a packet of crisps. When we came home I had a go on the computer I played a game called Trashman.My friend came to see me and we went out into the garden to have a look at the guinea pigs,and to play there.I came in and had my dinner at 5.30pm.We had potatoes,cauliflower, mince and onions.Then I went out to play again,I met-up with John then I had ice-cream.I went out again this time on my bike.Next I went to judo class at 8.00pm;I stayed there till 9.00pm.Then we went up to my nans she brought me a sweatshirt.Then I went home,I went up to bed at 10.00pm because there is no school tomorrow.I brushed my teeth and went to bed.
